description: Curated seed list of verified B2B AI SaaS tools. Excludes juggernauts (Salesforce, HubSpot, etc.) - focused on discoverable tools users may not know.

products.name: Instantly.ai
products.tagline: Scale your outreach with AI-powered cold email
products.description: Instantly.ai helps sales teams scale their cold email outreach with AI-powered warm-up, deliverability optimization, and automated sequences. Trusted by thousands of sales professionals.

products.name: Slybroadcast
products.description: Slybroadcast delivers voicemails directly to phone mailboxes without ringing. Perfect for sales teams doing outreach at scale with personalized AI-generated voice messages.

products.name: PostHog
products.description: PostHog provides product analytics, session recordings, feature flags, and A/B testing in one platform. AI-powered insights help product teams understand user behavior.

products.name: Jasper
products.tagline: AI writing assistant for marketing teams
products.description: Jasper is an AI content platform that helps marketing teams create blog posts, social media content, ads, and emails 10x faster with on-brand AI writing.

products.name: Copy.ai
products.description: Copy.ai generates marketing copy, blog posts, emails, and social media content using AI. Built for marketing teams who need to create content at scale.

products.name: Otter.ai
products.tagline: AI meeting assistant that takes notes for you
products.description: Otter.ai provides real-time transcription, automated meeting notes, and AI summaries. Integrates with Zoom, Google Meet, and Microsoft Teams.

products.name: Fireflies.ai
products.description: Fireflies.ai automatically records, transcribes, and analyzes meetings. AI-powered search and insights help teams find key moments and action items.

products.name: Lavender
products.tagline: AI email coach for sales teams
products.description: Lavender analyzes your emails in real-time and provides AI coaching to improve response rates. Helps sales reps write better emails that get replies.

products.name: Gong
products.description: Gong captures customer interactions across calls, emails, and meetings. AI analyzes conversations to surface insights that help close more deals.

products.name: Chorus.ai
products.description: Chorus.ai records and analyzes sales calls to identify what top performers do differently. AI-powered coaching helps reps improve their conversations.

products.name: Drift
products.description: Drift uses AI-powered chatbots to engage website visitors, qualify leads, and book meetings for sales teams automatically.

products.name: Intercom
products.description: Intercom combines AI chatbots, live chat, and help center to provide customer support. Fin AI agent resolves 50%+ of support questions automatically.

products.name: Synthesia
products.description: Synthesia turns text into professional videos with AI avatars. No cameras, actors, or studios needed. Perfect for training, marketing, and internal communications.

products.name: Descript
products.description: Descript lets you edit video and audio by editing text. AI features include automatic transcription, filler word removal, and voice cloning.

products.name: Runway
products.description: Runway provides AI-powered video editing, generation, and effects. Used by creative teams to produce professional video content faster.

products.name: Writesonic
products.tagline: AI writing tool for SEO content
products.description: Writesonic creates SEO-optimized blog posts, landing pages, and ad copy using AI. Built for marketers who need to rank in search.

products.name: Surfer SEO
products.description: Surfer SEO analyzes top-ranking pages and provides AI recommendations to optimize your content for search engines.

products.name: Clearbit
products.description: Clearbit enriches leads and accounts with firmographic data using AI. Identifies buying intent signals to help sales teams prioritize.

products.name: Apollo.io
products.description: Apollo.io combines a B2B database with AI-powered prospecting, sequencing, and analytics. Helps sales teams find and engage their ideal customers.

products.name: Outreach
products.description: Outreach helps sales teams create and close more pipeline with AI-powered sequences, analytics, and conversation intelligence.

products.name: Grammarly Business
products.description: Grammarly Business provides AI writing assistance across your entire organization. Ensures consistent, professional communication at scale.

products.name: Beautiful.ai
products.description: Beautiful.ai uses AI to automatically design professional presentations. Templates adapt as you add content, saving hours of design work.

products.name: Tome
products.description: Tome generates presentations and documents from prompts. AI creates narratives, finds images, and designs layouts automatically.

products.name: Loom
products.description: Loom lets you record quick videos to share with your team. AI features include automatic transcription, summaries, and chapter markers.

products.name: Notion AI
products.description: Notion AI helps teams write, brainstorm, and summarize within their Notion workspace. AI assistant integrated directly into docs and databases.

products.name: Zapier
products.description: Zapier connects 6,000+ apps to automate workflows. AI features help build automations from natural language descriptions.

products.name: Reclaim.ai
products.description: Reclaim.ai automatically finds time for your priorities, habits, and meetings. AI defends your calendar and reschedules when conflicts arise.

products.name: Clockwise
products.description: Clockwise uses AI to optimize your calendar, move meetings to create focus time, and resolve scheduling conflicts automatically.

products.name: Sembly AI
products.description: Sembly AI joins your meetings to take notes, identify action items, and generate summaries. Works with all major video conferencing platforms.

products.name: Grain
products.description: Grain records meetings, highlights key moments, and shares clips with your team. AI identifies important discussions automatically.

products.name: Textio
products.description: Textio uses AI to help HR teams write more effective, inclusive job posts that attract diverse candidates.

products.name: Eightfold.ai
products.description: Eightfold.ai uses AI to match candidates to roles, identify internal mobility opportunities, and predict workforce needs.

products.name: HireVue
products.description: HireVue provides video interviewing with AI-powered assessments. Helps HR teams screen candidates at scale while reducing bias.

products.name: Amplitude
products.description: Amplitude helps product teams understand user behavior with AI-powered analytics, behavioral cohorts, and predictive insights.

products.name: Mixpanel
products.tagline: Product analytics for mobile and web
products.description: Mixpanel provides event-based analytics with AI insights. Helps product teams understand user journeys and optimize conversion.

products.name: Heap
products.description: Heap automatically captures user interactions and uses AI to surface insights about user behavior and friction points.

products.name: Pendo
products.description: Pendo combines analytics, in-app guides, and feedback. AI helps product teams understand usage patterns and improve adoption.

products.name: UserTesting
products.description: UserTesting helps teams get feedback from real users. AI analyzes responses to identify themes and sentiment automatically.

products.name: Hotjar
products.description: Hotjar provides heatmaps, recordings, and surveys. AI highlights interesting sessions and identifies rage clicks automatically.

products.name: FullStory
products.description: FullStory captures every user interaction and uses AI to surface frustration signals, errors, and opportunities to improve UX.

products.name: Sprig
products.description: Sprig captures user feedback at the moment of experience. AI analyzes responses and identifies trends across thousands of users.

products.name: Dovetail
products.description: Dovetail helps teams analyze user research at scale. AI transcribes, tags, and surfaces insights from interviews and feedback.

products.name: Miro AI
products.description: Miro's AI features help teams brainstorm, summarize, and organize visual content on their collaborative whiteboards.

products.name: Figma AI
products.description: Figma's AI features help designers generate layouts, rename layers, and search designs using natural language.

products.name: Canva
products.description: Canva provides AI features like Magic Write, background removal, and design generation. Makes professional design accessible to non-designers.

products.name: Lumen5
products.description: Lumen5 transforms blog posts and text content into engaging videos using AI. Perfect for social media marketing teams.

products.name: Pictory
products.description: Pictory creates videos from long-form content using AI. Turns blog posts, webinars, and podcasts into short video clips.
